== Description ==
Load either [[wikipedia:Atom_(standard)|Atom]] comment feed or [[wikipedia:Atom_(standard)|Atom]] posts feed.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php do_feed_atom( $for_comments ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$for_comments|boolean|<tt>true</tt> for the comment feed, <tt>false</tt> for normal feed.}}

== Return Values ==
; (void) : This function does not return a value.
